movies.title: HazMat
movies.plot: Jacob is a troubled soul and when his friends pull a prank on him in the very place his father was killed, he snaps, grabs an ax and hunts them down like animals. Trapped inside, they must fight for their lives from this disturbed ax-wielding maniac.
movies.simplePlot: Trapped inside an abandoned building, a group of friends must fight for their lives from a disturbed ax-wielding maniac.

biography.bio: Norbert Velez is an actor, known for HazMat (2013), Wall of Shame (2011) and I Before Thee (2016).
biography.name: Norbert Velez

biography.bio: Aniela McGuinness started her career behind the scenes but always knew that she belonged on the other side. With a technical theater degree from Florida State University, she quickly followed in her father's footstep and became an IATSE journeyman. With dedication and drive she became the carpentry assistant and electric assistant the James L. Knight Center and very quickly got offered a contract as a production props person for Florida Grand Opera. She became an ensemble cast member of the longest running improvisational comedy troupe in Miami "Laughing Gas" during her summers off but the desire to be on the stage just grew stronger and she finally made the leap to follow her dream full-time in the summer of 2009. Again her dedication and drive propelled her forward. She soon landed a national SAG campaign for Home Depot, then a cast member on a Spanish Sitcom on Univision as the kooky bilingual neighbor. Immediately after she got cast in the blockbuster film "Rock of Ages", staring Tom Cruise, as a waitress. She has been a co-star on Burn Notice and Charlie's Angels, not to mention the lead in many indie short films.
biography.name: Aniela McGuinness

biography.bio: Todd Bruno is an actor and producer, known for Proximity (2013), Losses (2011) and HazMat (2013).
biography.name: Todd Bruno

biography.bio: Gema Calero is an actress and producer, known for HazMat (2013), Agoraphobia (2015) and All Girls Weekend (2016).
biography.name: Gema Calero

biography.bio: Giordan Diaz was born and raised in Miami, Florida by two lovely Cuban parents. Ever since he can remember he has always been drawn to the magic of movies and the arts. During his years in high school he became involved with television production, creating and performing in his own projects. He began to take classes locally and doing extra work on various spanish soap operas, film, and television productions in Miami. After much debating when he graduated high school, Giordan decided to attend Barry University where he majored in Theatre and earned a Bachelors in Fine Arts (B.F.A.) with a Specialization in Acting. During his studies, he participated in over a dozen theatrical productions ranging from classical texts (Three Sisters, Twelfth Night) to more contemporary plays (The Rimers of Eldritch, Big Love). He also participated in various student and independent films, always working and perfecting his craft. Upon graduating, Giordan continued to work in south Florida's regional theatre and independent film scenes. He is an official company member of Mad Cat Theatre Company (Miami, Fl) and has moved to New York City to pursue his dreams as a working actor.
biography.name: Giordan Diaz

biography.bio: Tom Stedham is an actor and producer, known for Ardennes Fury (2014), Torment (2008) and Platoon of the Dead (2009).
biography.name: Tom Stedham

biography.bio: Daniela Larez was born on September 14, 1989 in Venezuela. She is an actress, known for HazMat (2013) and That Blue Devil! (2014).
biography.name: Daniela Larez

biography.bio: Reggie Peters is an actor and producer, known for If Loving You Is Wrong (2014), HazMat (2013) and The Breaking Point (2014).
biography.name: Reggie Peters

biography.bio: Mario is a SAG/AFTRA actor born in Brooklyn NY who works in TV, film & stage. He also holds a professional chef degree from the culinary academy of long island. He is known for his chameleon-like way of changing appearance to accommodate a role . Mario will travel for the right role & work unaccredited if he deems the work interesting.
biography.name: Mario Nalini

biography.bio: Dennis Spain is an actor and writer, known for Dead Giveaway (2013), Birthday Punch (2012) and HazMat (2013).
biography.name: Dennis Spain

biography.bio: Brandi Rudicil is an actor and casting director, known for HazMat (2013), Infidel (2012) and Quarterlifers (2011).
biography.name: Brandi Rudicil

biography.bio: Massiel Checo was born on December 23, 1986 in the Dominican Republic. She is an actress, known for HazMat (2013), 2053 Two Girls, a Dragon & a Fisherman (2014) and I Before Thee (2016). She was previously married to Javier Luis Perez.
biography.name: Massiel Checo
